i	0	1	2	3	4	5
x[i]	0.1	0.5	0.9	1.3	1.7	2.1
F1(x[i])	-1.63687	-1.08653	-0.536198	0.0141381	0.564474	1.11481



i	0	1	2	3	4	5
x[i]	0.1	0.5	0.9	1.3	1.7	2.1
F2(x[i])	-2.12906	-0.988096	-0.142444	0.407892	0.662913	0.622618

F1(x) = -1.77445 + 1.37584*x

F2(x) = -2.46045 + 3.40613*x + -0.922861*x^2
